SECTION_HISTORY.TITLE: Our Story
SECTION_HISTORY.DESCRIPTION: It was in December 2014 when we exchanged a 'nice to meet you,' and in August 2017 our paths crossed again. After a very patriotic date on September 16th, the weekends became ours, and we became inseparable. It didn't take long for us to love each other unconditionally and become a family together with our daughter Sof√≠a. 8 years later, after so many adventures and good times, we are pleased to invite you to the celebration of our love.

CEREMONY.TITLE: Ceremony
CEREMONY.DESCRIPTION: The wedding ceremony will take place at Hacienda Murmullo de Agua, Valle de Guadalupe, BC.

DRESS_CODE.TITLE: Dress code
DRESS_CODE.DESCRIPTION: Formal attire. Women: Midi and long dresses are welcome, floral or romantic (the choice is yours); please avoid white or red. Men: Formal, suit and tie.

RECEPTION.TITLE: Reception
RECEPTION.DESCRIPTION: The celebration will be held at Hacienda Murmullo de Agua, Valle de Guadalupe, BC.

SECTION_GIFTS.TITLE: Our greatest gift is your presence
SECTION_GIFTS.DESCRIPTION: However, if you wish to give us a present, we would greatly appreciate a monetary gift (envelope) or gift cards: Target, Walmart, or Costco Shop Cards ü§ç‚úâÔ∏è
